pageTitle: Sorry, there is a problem with the service – DS1500 Report a terminally ill patient – GOV.UK
p1: We were unable to authenticate you from the NHS Spine portal.
p2: Please contact your NHS IT Service Desk to ensure that DS1500 is added as a 'Trusted Site' to your web browser. Then try again.
p3: If the problem persists, please contact {{url}}
